products.title: Nordic Oak Faux Wood Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: Scandinavian interior style is one of the greatest things to come out of the northern countries, and this nordic oak faux wood blind is a fine example of their wonderful good taste. With its light shade, this blind feels fresh, pared back and a sleek way to bring grace and eleg scandinavian interior style is one of the greatest things to come out of the northern countries, and this nordic oak faux wood blind is a fine example of their wonderful good taste.

products.title: Hygge Birds Nordic Blue Roller Blind
products.description: So fresh and good-natured, the hygge birds nordic blue roller blind is as scandi as the trend that its so beautifully named after. Taking the pleasure of the small things, the playful birds carry heart shapes and are decorated in sweet tones. The simply stylised leaves and c so fresh and good-natured, the hygge birds nordic blue roller blind is as scandi as the trend that its so beautifully named after.

products.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Nordic Asc Ice
products.description: Nordic asc perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. The advanced solar coating on the reverse of the fabric significantly reduces heat and glare entering your room, making them ideal for south facing windows and conservatories. Perfect fit pleated blind nordic asc ice available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Nordic Indigo - Roman Blind
products.description: The sweet floral illustrations of the nordic in indigo have a contemporary, scandinavian feel to them, and the royal blue background is wonderfully offset by the ice white of the pattern, making for a homely yet modern roman blind. Choose an unusual colour scheme of blue and white for your kitchen, keeping the main items of flooring, walls, tiling, and units in these two colours. Then add an accent colour, perhaps yellow, lime, or orange, to bring the room to life.

products.title: Nordic Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: In vivid mustard yellow and pure white, the nordic in ochre has a distinctly scandinavian feel to it, highlighted by its clean lines and vibrant imagery. The pretty florals and foliage sit boldly against the background, so there's no chance of this blind fading into the background. Liven up your kitchen by opting for a vibrant yellow colour palette. Add varying shades of yellow, including the occasional orange and lime for contrast, and temper the look with white walls or units.

products.title: Nordic Noir - Roman Blind
products.description: In true monochrome style, the nordic noir features a start, jet black and the iciest of whites, both displayed in a contemporary floral pattern featuring both blossoms and foliage. The look is cool, calm, and collected, and will look fantastic in a range of colour schemes. Go bold or go home by adding the noir to a lime, black, and white colour scheme in your home office. Paint a feature wall in zesty lime, and opt for black and white furniture with clean lines and a modern finish, using lime to accent with cushions, throws, and wall art.

products.title: Nordic Scarlet - Roman Blind
products.description: Bold cherry red is the colour of the day with the nordic in cherry. Lively, vivacious, and full of character, this scandinavia-inspired roman blind is no wallflower. The ice white of the florals stands out like a charm against the vibrant red of the background. If you'd love a contemporary look in your living room, consider including the cherry in your dcor scheme. Go for stark white walls, intercepted by this pretty blind, and include red tones for your soft furnishings, wall art, and ornaments.

products.title: Nordic
products.description: Min width: 300mm max width: 2400mm min drop: 300mm max drop: 3000mm slat composition: basswood slat widths available: 50mm guarantee: 12 months controls: a choice of standard controls (left hand tilt / right hand raise & lower), left hand controls (left hand tilt / left hand raise & lower) or right hand controls (right hand tilt / right hand raise & lower). Styling: co-ordinating cords as standard, tapes optional.

products.title: Nordic Solar Ice Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: A solar control fabric in neutral shades to both compliment your dcor and provide solar protection. Featuring an aluminium coated back, this fabric reflects heat in summer and retains heat in summer. A perfect thermal fabric. Product id: db-pls0128 fabric colour: icecream material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.
